hadiths.text: It was narrated from Abu Rafi' that the Messenger of Allah (ﷺ) said:“The partner has more right to what is near him, so long as he is still a partner.”

chapter.ara-name: باب إِذَا وَقَعَتِ الْحُدُودُ فَلاَ شُفْعَةَ
chapter.eng-name: If The Boundaries Have Been Fixed Then There Is No Preemption
